name: The Storage Manager
description:
A sokoban style game with 10 levels. I made this game for the game jam "RSS - Garagem dos Jogos". And I loved to make this kind of game.  You can try your best against time, movement steps or both!

I will comment the code and I will leave here the full project for GMS 2.3 for anyone wanting to create a game like this using Game Maker Studio. 

Have fun and happy game making!
